hero.subtitle: Explore the fusion of 2D and technology in the music world, feel the infinite possibilities of future music

about.title: About Us
about.lead_description: Dulcets is a creative team specializing in music production, video creation, illustration, and 3D modeling. We bring your ideas to life and deliver works that resonate with hearts.
about.content: We are dedicated to crafting unique and captivating Japanese anime songs, J-pop, J-Rock, and background music (BGM). Whether it's an exhilarating theme song or a heart-touching insert track, our team meticulously refines every note. Our composers, arrangers, and mixing engineers are not only experts in these musical styles but also have a keen eye for detail. We believe that each client has distinct musical needs, so we tailor each piece to perfectly fit your project and exceed your expectations. Let's bring your musical vision to life together.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide a full range of music services, from production to marketing, to help you succeed.

music.title: Music Production
music.description: High-quality music production, including composing, arranging, and recording.

artist.description: Comprehensive artist management services to help you grow your career.

production.description: Professional sound production, including mixing, mastering, and sound effects.

distribution.title: Music Distribution
distribution.description: Global music distribution to all major platforms, including Spotify, Apple Music, and more.

marketing.title: Music Marketing
marketing.description: Customized music marketing campaigns to help you reach your target audience.

events.title: Event Planning
events.description: Professional event planning services, including concerts, fan meetings, and more.

character_modeling.title: Virtual Character Modeling
character_modeling.desc: From concept design to complete 3D models, we provide high-quality virtual character modeling services for animation, games, and virtual idol streaming.

scene_modeling.title: Scene and Prop Modeling
scene_modeling.desc: Creating immersive virtual scenes and props, providing high-quality 3D environment assets for music MVs, games, and virtual performances.
